ing: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
des: "This smoothie is so delicious you won't even think about how good it is for you. Don't be frightened by the tofu. If it wasn't listed here, you wouldn't even know it was in there! You can use a sugar substitute (such as SplendaÂ®) instead of sugar, if desired."
ins: Blend yogurt, strawberries, tofu, banana, milk, and sugar together in a blender until desired consistency is reached.
